text: I had been a part of the R&D team for a year for River Indie. It was a great experience to work alongside such passionate individuals to build such a product in a short amount of time and achieve sales figures of 1000 units a month.
author: @rawpowerindia

text:
I have an idea for a very niche product. In fact, it is globally niche. In my opinion, our country currently needs more of such vehicles on the roads, but big scale manufacturers shy away from this, because of the huge risk factor, market reluctance in accepting niche products as well as government policy uncertainties. There are some start-ups who have pitched similar products but it seems to be a "Freedom 251" type scam.

Given our changing times, I believe our market needs more such products, but people's ego and false pride might prove to be the Achilles heel.
